generic:link.msg:message: Identity "Total of Balance O/S = sum of values of all 'Name of Bank/NBFC or other Financial Entity' related to 'Term Loan, Working Capital, Debentures, Commercial Paper, Loan Overdraft, Others'" do not tally.

"Identity ""Value of Total Balance O/S = (Term Loan Balance O/S + Working Capital Balance O/S + Debentures Balance O/S + Commercial Papers Balance O/S + Loan Overdraft Balance O/S + Others Balance O/S)"" do not tally."

Identity "Total of Balance O/S = sum of values of all 'Name of Bank/NBFC or other Financial Entity' related to 'Letter of Credit, Financial & Other Guarantees, Bills Re-Discounted, Lease Contracts, Forward Exchange Contracts, Interest Rates Swaps'" do not tally.

If the user selects ‘No’ for “Whether Call / Put Option is Enabled”, then next three columns, i.e. ‘Type of Option’ ‘If Yes, Whether the Call / Put Option is Exercised’ ‘Date of Exercise of Call / Put Option’ should be empty.
If the user selects ‘No’ for “If Yes, Whether the Call / Put Option is Exercised’”, then next column ‘Date of Exercise of Call / Put Option’ should be empty.

If the user selects ‘No’ for “Whether Call / Put Option is Enabled”, then next three columns, i.e. ‘Type of Option’ ‘If Yes, Whether the Call / Put Option is Exercised’ ‘Date of Exercise of Call / Put Option’ should be empty.
If the user selects ‘No’ for “If Yes, Whether the Call / Put Option is Exercised’”, then next column ‘Date of Exercise of Call / Put Option’ should be empty.
If the user chooses 'No' for 'Whether the Group Associate / Subsidiary Company is registered with RBI as NBFC?, then next column ˜If Yes, Please provide the NBFC Code of NBFC" should be empty.
Permanent Account Number should be in proper format
Please enter valid CIN if applicable, otherwise enter NA.
